title: Google Store UK spring sale offers £50 off Pixel 6 and 6 Pro, plus more discounts
content:
The Google Store in the UK is offering a number of discounts on devices and accessories including the Pixel 6 and 6 Pro as part of a spring sale event.

more…

The post Google Store UK spring sale offers £50 off Pixel 6 and 6 Pro, plus more discounts appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Google Store UK spring sale is now live with discounts on a number of products including the Pixel 6/6 Pro, Nest Hub, and much more.
